BasicInfo.short: Jimdo enables users to create a website on a computer, smart phone or tablet using a simple intuitive interface.

Products.name: JimdoBusiness
Products.description: The JimdoBusiness package allows you to create your own business site and is specially tailored for small business and stores.

Products.name: JimdoFree
Products.description: The JimdoFree version is hosted on Jimdo with a dot Jimdo URL address. The version has less storage than the premium version and comes with

Products.name: JimdoPro
Products.description: The JimdoPro version allows you to host your own page. The version also provides you with more storage and comes ad-free.
